name: PDFCrop

properties.description: Places only the area defined by the PDF author as placeable artwork.
properties.name: CROP_ART

properties.description: Places only the area displayed by Acrobat.
properties.name: CROP_PDF

properties.description: Places only the area that represents the final trim size of the document.
properties.name: CROP_TRIM

properties.description: Places only the area that represents clipped content.
properties.name: CROP_BLEED

properties.description: Places the area that represents the physical paper size of the original PDF document.
properties.name: CROP_MEDIA

properties.description: Places the page's bounding box using visible layers only.
properties.name: CROP_CONTENT_VISIBLE_LAYERS

properties.description: Places the page's bounding box using all layers.
properties.name: CROP_CONTENT_ALL_LAYERS

description: The amount of the PDF document to place.
